summary: Results-driven logistics professional with 15+ years of experience in warehouse operations, seeking a part-time Warehouse Worker role at Advanced Heating and Air Contractors. Skilled in operating heavy equipment, including forklifts and reach trucks, with a strong background in inventory management, safety regulations, and team collaboration. Proficient in maintaining an organized workspace, with experience in packing, put-away, and unloading shipments. Possesses a valid Forklift Certification and is comfortable with some heavy lifting required.

bullets: Orchestrated logistics for a high-volume agricultural shipper, managing a fleet of 20+ drivers and 60+ daily outbound shipments.
Maintained 99% on-time delivery rate to major retailers through rigorous planning and driver management.
Architected and deployed internal automation tools using Python and Selenium to streamline data collection and reporting workflows.
Implemented secure API authentication protocols to protect sensitive driver and route data.

education: Associate of Science in Computer Science (In Progress)
